thread.title: Shay Mitchell is getting a reality show called “Shades of Shay,” and we’re already in love
thread.title_full: Shay Mitchell is getting a reality show called “Shades of Shay,” and we’re already in love

author: Bradleigh-Ann Walker
title: Shay Mitchell is getting a reality show called “Shades of Shay,” and we’re already in love
text:
Shay Mitchell is getting a reality show called “Shades of Shay,” and we’re already in love One of our favorite Pretty Little Liars , Shay Mitchell, is headed for reality television and we can’t wait. The show, Shades of Shay , will air on Fullscreen , a subscription video service.
Since Pretty Little Liars is ready to air its seventh and final season, Shades of Shay will give us an intimate look at the actress’ life and the next steps in her career.
In addition to starring, Shay will be executive producing the eight-episode reality series.
Hopefully, we’ll be getting some tips from her show on how to be a girl boss. She’s already branching out into cosmetics alongside her acting career, partnering with Smashbox for an eyeshadow line .
This is like the surprise party that was almost impossible to keep a secret!!! I'm so excited that I can finally share my collab with Smashbox, available today to VIB Rouge Members online @sephora and @sephoracanada (everyone else tomorrow 11/28!). I had so much fun with my glam squad creating 7 looks with each new #CoverShotPalette . Check them all out on @smashboxcosmetics NOW! Can’t wait to see how you wear the looks (And yes, that is real powder being thrown at me!)+ 
A photo posted by Shay Mitchell (@shaym) on Nov 27, 2016 at 2:16pm PST 
“The color schemes range from neutral to metallic to totally eye-searing (yes, that is a neon matte rainbow palette), and they all pack a pigmented punch,” Shay wrote on Instagram when she debuted the products.
When it finally stops raining... 
A photo posted by Shay Mitchell (@shaym) on Jan 11, 2017 at 9:42pm PST 
When it comes to style and glam, Shay is definitely one of our favorite ladies on television. We’re so excited to see Shades of Shay and get a glimpse of what her daily routine is like.
Pretty Little Liars ‘ final season premieres on Tuesday, April 18, 2017 on Freeform.
3 out of 5 for our family portrait #PLLfarewelltour 
A photo posted by Shay Mitchell (@shaym) on Jan 10, 2017 at 1:50pm PST 
Fullscreen’s subscription is available for $5.99 per month. We don’t know about you, but we’ll be tuning in to see Queen Shay!
